Ihiala bụ obodo dị na Naịjirịa, dị na ndịda steeti Anambra na n'ime mpaghara a na-akpọ Igboland
Ọ dịla anya dị ka isi obodo nchịkwa nke ime obodo Ihiala Local Government Area
Mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo nwere ihe dịka mmadụ 87,796
Ihiala bu obodo kacha ibu na ime obodo Ihiala nke mejukwara otutu obodo ndi ozo dika Amorka, Azia, Lilu, Okija, Mbosi, Isseke, Orsumoghu, Ubuluisuzor na Uli
Ọ dabere na eriri ugbo nke steeti.
Ihiala bụ onye nọchitere anya ugbu a na ụlọ omebe iwu Federal site n'aka Honourable Ifeanyi Chudy Momah [  The Current Oluoha of Ihiala (Traditional Ruler) bụ Igwe Thomas Ikenna Amuta Obidiegwu.
Chinwoke Mbadinuju, onye nke bubu Govano,Nwa uli
Ebuka Obi-Uchendu onye oka ikpe,Onye nke na-arubu ka onye Ihe onyonyo
